duties_responsibilities.duty: Craft motion designs that are innovative, elegant, and beautiful, while being able to rapidly produce rough idea sketches and add perspectives to share with the team.
Create and design a plan for next steps to a certain problem to uplift a design.
Produce motion studies for user flows and quickly iterate on multiple design solutions.
Craft UX motion behaviors to guide and add delightful experience for users.
Communicate, defend, and build consensus around visual + motion definition and design direction.
Collaborate with software engineers to implement animation and motion concepts.
Understand technical constraints, user goals, and business requirements that shape current and future products.
Participate as a primary, co and contributing author on any project deliverables.
Advise on and provide alternative (out of the box) solutions.
Mentor and transfer knowledge to client project team members.
Participate in data conversion and data maintenance.
Provide thought leadership as well as hands-on technical configuration/development as needed.

education_certification.credential: BA/BS degree in Interaction or Graphic Design, Motion, Communication Design or equivalent design-related field (Master's preferred)
